biography: Tommy is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Espoo Ringside Golf.  He has quickly made a name for himself on the competitive circuit, consistently demonstrating skill and precision on the course.

Tommy's dedication to the game is evident in his consistent appearances at the prestigious Hector Trophée, having competed in the 2024 and 2025 editions of this challenging invitational. While he is yet to secure a victory in the main Hector Trophée competition, his performances have consistently placed him among the tournament's top contenders.  His precision and strategic game are hallmarks of his play.

Although Tommy is still building his trophy case, his consistent performance and dedication bode well for his future appearances at the Hector Trophée.  He remains a formidable competitor, and golf enthusiasts eagerly anticipate his future successes.
